title: AT PRONITE
content: I am able to buy tickets for myself but how do I buy it for my friends from other college?

comments.body: ticketing isn't open for students from other colleges yet, you'll have to wait for them to announce its open
Ohh..so I need to buy for myself now or wait till they announce even for them?like can I buy tickets alon with theirs or will I have no chance to buy?
i think its best to get yourself tickets now, bcs the prices will increase
bro i bought tix formyself but i got no confirmation mailðŸ‘½
Honestly I felt this club isn't doing well..I texted them like a week ago and still got no reply!
nah bruh my friend also texted em for smth they dint respond to her either
you cant do that, its only for PES students this time afaik
